name: Ricetta: gelatina alla menta
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mint Jelly.

value.name: Menta
value.desc: Un ingrediente rinfrescante che pu√≤ mitigare la piccantezza di molti piatti.

value.name: Zucchero
value.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

value.name: Gelatina alla menta
value.desc: A refreshing dessert. The steps to making this are quite simple indeed, and when it slides down your throat, the faint, fresh flavor of mint will leave you feeling reinvigorated for the rest of the day.

value.name: Aloy
value.desc: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

value.name: Gelatina saziante
value.desc: Aloy's specialty. The cross-section looks perfect, its shape is regular, and it gives off a cool air. At first, Aloy seemed a bit apprehensive as to whether you'd enjoy this rather unique dessert, but she was relieved when you wolfed it all down in one go...
